name: Dubstep Ghost
description:
Possess and dominate your enemies in this dubstep-driven monster game!

I recommend you play fullscreen.

Tested with recent versions of Firefox, Chrome and Edge.

Controls - Ghost:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click/Right Click Ground - Teleport
  • Left Click Enemy - Bite
  • Right Click Enemy - Possess

Controls - Enemy

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Suicide

You can press K at any time to reset the current level.
